title: catalog_reporting Lambda Input
description: The input for the catalog_reporting Lambda.

providerId.description: The unique ID of the provider(s) making the request.

collectionId.description: The unique ID of collection(s) to compare.

granuleId.description: The unique ID of granule(s) to compare.

startTimestamp.description: Cumulus granule createdAt start time for date range to compare data, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC.

endTimestamp.description: Cumulus granule createdAt end-time for date range to compare data, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC.

pageIndex.description: The 0-based index of the results page to return.
